name: Robusto Candela
additionalNotes:
Robusto Candela Bundle of 25
(5" 48 ring) Cuban seeded tobacco from the Dominican Republic blended with Honduran tobacco. Wrapped with the Candela Leaf. Candela is basically a bright green wrapper color achieved by a process which traps the chlorophyll content of the leaf prior to fermentation. It is a mild, mellow, pleasant and light smoke! Bundle of 25.
